overview: Are you an avid listener to the late night radio talk show Bare On Air? Well tonight you'll get to know 13 delectable boys as they talk with Radio Blue Line about their very first sexual adventures. A three-way in the living room, a friendly morning fuck in the shower and bathtub, a quickie at the vanity, an oral and ass workout at the gym, by the motorcycles in the garage and even in the kitchen. These sexy Euro twinks are out of control when it comes to cumming!
title: Bare On Air
